definitions.definition: a structure consisting of strips of wood or metal crossed and fastened together with square or diamond-shaped spaces left between, used typically as a screen or fence or as a support for climbing plants.
examples: grid, latticework, fretwork, open framework, openwork, trellis, trelliswork, espalier, grille, network, mesh the ivy-covered lattice

definitions.definition: an interlaced structure or pattern resembling this.
examples: the lattice of branches above her

definitions.definition: a regular repeated three-dimensional arrangement of atoms, ions, or molecules in a metal or other crystalline solid.
